definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Of course, we don’t accept the unrealistic overstatement about reverse merger.
sentences.chinese: 当然我们并不认同那些片面夸大反向收购作用的作法。

sentences.english: The boy plays up his strong points and minimizes his weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 这男孩夸大自己的长处，极力缩小自己的缺点。

sentences.english: Inevitably her exploits were exaggerated and she became known as an adventuress .
sentences.chinese: 难免会夸大她的勇敢行为，她成了有名的探险者。

sentences.english: That’s a slightly Utopian overstatement, but there is some truth in it.
sentences.chinese: 这可能有点夸大其词，但还是有道理的。

sentences.english: You should start by being honest and not exaggerating.
sentences.chinese: 从一开始，你就应该诚实，而不要夸大其辞。

sentences.english: She would often romance about her bitter experiences.
sentences.chinese: 她总是夸大其词地讲她的痛苦经历。

sentences.english: People will not believe a man who always exaggerates.
sentences.chinese: 人们不会相信老是夸大其词的人。

sentences.english: It is not proper to exaggerate influences of the former Soviet Union scholar Steherbastsky s writings in China.
sentences.chinese: 此外，郑文过分夸大了舍尔巴茨基著作在中国的影响。

sentences.english: It exaggerates the scale of the slide and misunderstands its cause.
sentences.chinese: 它夸大了下跌幅度，并误解了其原因。

sentences.english: Some citizens have even accused the government of deliberately inflating casualty numbers to attract more foreign aid.
sentences.chinese: 一些人指责当局故意夸大伤亡人数来吸引外国援助。

sentences.english: The salesman padded the bill for his travelling expenses by exaggerating his food expenses.
sentences.chinese: 推销员夸大伙食费的开支来虚报出差费。

sentences.english: It is an exaggerated fear of clowns.
sentences.chinese: 这是对小丑一种夸大了的恐惧。

sentences.english: In fact, the greening of china has been massively overstated.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，中国的绿色化被严重夸大了。

sentences.english: Yet, one should not exaggerate the extent or uniqueness of Russia-China military ties.
sentences.chinese: 然而，人们不应夸大中俄军事合作的范围和独特性。

sentences.english: Decent programmer testing magnifies the damage it does.
sentences.chinese: 合格的程序员测试夸大了它产生的破坏。

definition: to belittle/to disparage/to play down/to demean/to degrade/to devalue
to compile/to draw up/to fabricate/to invent/to concoct/to make up/to cook up
to sensationalize (idiom); deliberate exaggeration to scare people
to give a false picture of the situation
